definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了矿煤球团用铁精矿及添加剂包壳的优点。

sentences.english: The loss of tin in the sulphide copper concentrate was less than 4%.
sentences.chinese: 同时锡在铜精矿中的损失也不到4%。

sentences.english: The calcines of siliceous zinc sulfide concentrates were treated hydrometallurgically.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高硅硫化锌精矿焙烧料的湿法处理。

sentences.english: The oxygen autogenous smelting process of nickeliferous copper concentrate from Jinchuan Nonferrous Corp. is thermodynamically analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对金川二次铜精矿氧气自热熔炼过程进行热力学分析。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a zinc concentrate fluidized roaster.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种锌精矿沸腾焙烧炉。

sentences.english: Shaker concentrate containing a large number of sulfide ore, floating sulfur before floating scheelite.
sentences.chinese: 摇床精矿含有大量的硫化矿，浮白钨之前先浮硫。

sentences.english: The lead is a common non-ferrous metal element in the gold concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 铅是金精矿中常见的有色金属元素。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a separation method for a bismuth-molybdenum-copper-sulfide mixed concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 一种铋钼铜硫混合精矿的分离方法。

sentences.english: The influences of different moisture on the properties of Jiding magnetite concentrates pellets were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水分对冀东磁铁精矿成球性能的影响。

sentences.english: This article is studying in the pretreatment approach of high-sulfur and high-arsenic refractory gold concentrate(HHRGC).
sentences.chinese: 本文是对高硫高砷难浸金精矿的预处理方法进行研究。

sentences.english: Since Jiuquan iron ore concentrate has particularly chemical, mineralogical and sintering characters, the productivity of sinter made of, that concentrate is quite low.
sentences.chinese: 酒钢红铁精矿由于其性质特殊，烧结生产率较低。

definition: mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
